title: Game is running poorly no matter what i do
body: I stopped playing for about 2 weeks and when I came back the game updated normally and everything seemed fine but when I started playing i noticed my fps was a lot lower than normal. I haven't changed anything on my computer during the 2 weeks but even when I go from the lowest to max game settings my fps stays low no matter what.

replies.body: Your drivers might be out of date, which could cause issues regardless of the issues you choose.  There might be bad game files as well, but the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help rule out possibilities while tuning up your PC.  Let me know if that helps, but be sure to test it in customs.
